role.argrole: to whom? (usually marked by ب or ل)

example.parse: (S (PP (PREP الى) (NP (DEM_PRON_MS ذلك))) (PUNC ,) (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS اعتبر) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (SBAR (SUB_CONJ ان) (S (NP-TPC-1 (NP (NOUN_QUANT+CASE_DEF_ACC اي) (NP (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_GEN عمل) (ADJ+CASE_INDEF_GEN عسكري))) (NP-ADV (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC ضد) (NP (DET+NOUN_PROP+CASE_DEF_GEN العراق)))) (VP (PRT (FUT_PART س)) (IV3FS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I تكون) (NP-SBJ (NOUN+CASE_DEF_NOM نتائج) (NP (NP (POSS_PRON_3MS ه)) (NP (-NONE- *T*-1)))) (ADJP-PRD (ADJP (PUNC ") (ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_INDEF_ACC مدمرة) (PUNC ") (PP (PREP ل) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN لشرق) (DET+ADJ_COMP+CASE_DEF_GEN الاوسط)))) (CONJ و) (ADJP (PUNC ") (ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_INDEF_ACC مضرة) (PUNC ") (PP (PREP ب) (NP (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN مصالح) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_PL+CASE_DEF_GEN الولايات) (DET+ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN المتحدة))) (PP-LOC (PREP في) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN المنطقة))))))))))) (PUNC .))

arg.g: to the interests of the United States
